summary: A man spends a summer day swimming as many pools as he can all over a quiet suburban town.
cast: Burt Lancaster|Janet Landgard|Janice Rule|Tony Bickley|Marge Champion|Nancy Cushman|Bill Fiore|David Garfield|Kim Hunter|Rose Gregorio|Charles Drake|Bernie Hamilton|House Jameson|Jimmy Joyce|Michael Kearney|Richard McMurray|Jan Miner|Diana Muldaur|Keri Oleson|Joan Rivers|Cornelia Otis Skinner|Dolph Sweet|Louise Troy|Diana Van der Vlis|Philip Bruns|Alva Celauro|John Cheever|Lisa Daniels|Hugh Franklin|John Gerstad|Marilyn Langner|Ray Mason|Dennis McMullen
title: El nadador
